name: Artifacts Workflow

on:
    pull_request:
        branches: [main]

jobs:
    upload:
        runs-on: ubuntu-latest

        steps:
            - name: Create artifact file
              run: date > date.txt
            - name: Upload artifact file
              uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
              with:
                name: uploaded
                path: date.txt
                retention-days: 5
    
    download:
        runs-on: ubuntu-latest
        needs: upload
        steps:
            - name: Download artifact file
              uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
              with:
                name: uploaded
                path: downloaded
            - name: Show artifact content
              run: cat downloaded/date.txt
